channel.title: NetNewsWire Betas
channel.description: Most recent NetNewsWire changes with links to updates.

item.title: NetNewsWire 7.0b2
item.description:
• Fixed crash when downloading a theme
  • Fixed hiding read articles (the toggle wasn’t toggling, now it is)

item.title: NetNewsWire 7.0b1
item.description:
Besides the changes listed, there are many under-the-hood changes affecting all parts of the app. Bugs could appear anywhere! Please report anything you find to our bug tracker or to the Beta Testing topic in the Discourse forum.

  • Adopted Liquid Glass UI
  • Adopted Swift 6 structured concurrency
  • Improved window state restoration when sidebar is collapsed
  • Added custom About window
  • Changed link in the Help from Slack to Discourse

item.title: NetNewsWire 6.2.1
item.description:
Changes since 6.2:

  • Fixed some crashing bugs
  • Fixed a bug where, on some Macs, the user couldn’t select an OPML file to import
